item.title: Nice try, Apple, but nope
item.description: So, Apple has issued a statement that its sharing of the user’s browser history with Tencent is limited to users from mainland China. Nice try, but not good enough until they actually clarify that in their terms of protection from fraudulent sites, which still say the same as before: Before visiting a website, Safari may send information calculated from the website address to Google Safe Browsing and Tencent Safe Browsing to check if the website is fraudulent.
